headline: Looking at the example provided, the CSV starts with a header row: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Then each subsequent row represents an article. For instance:

headline: El loco del martillo
author: La Seño María
content: Hoy en día, uno pensaría que...

headline: Contento por fin de cuarentena
author: Ismael Lazo, Vecino de San Luis
